akn:section.akn:heading: Violations of law or regulations; punishment

akn:content.akn:p: § 730. Violations of law or regulations; punishment Any person who shall violate or fail to comply with any provision of or any regulation made pursuant to this chapter shall be deemed guilty of a misdemeanor, and upon conviction thereof shall be fined not more than $500 or be imprisoned not more than six months, or both. (June 7, 1924, ch. 346, § 11, 43 Stat. 652.)
